Pre-Game Insights: South Africa have lost nine of the 11 completed T20Is they have played since the start of 2023.
Sri Lanka have won their last three T20I series in a row, but against Bangladesh, Afghanistan, and Zimbabwe.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kagiso Rabada had left the IPL early with a soft tissue infection in a lower limb, but is available to play SA's World Cup opener.
Others: The match is the 4th Match, Group D, New York, June 03, 2024, ICC Men's T20 World Cup. The result is South Africa won by 6 wickets (with 22 balls remaining).
